amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the appropriations in the bill for HUD Management and Salaries by $31 million and to increas funds available for Leaking Underground Storage Tank Program by $11. 2 million.

action.text: Mr. Stokes raised a point of order against the Hefley amendment (A013). Mr. Stokes stated that the amendment constituted an unauthorized increase in appropriations. The Chair sustained the point of order.
